pages.text: Counters with Dolia (or dolia for short in the context of fluid storage / transfer) are kitchen facilities. Like others, they have variants of different $(l:intro/kitchen_materials)materials$(/l).
Counters with Dolia can be used to store fluid, and they provide resting recipes. There is no difference between counters built with different materials
Counters with Dolia have three input slots and an output slot in their GUI.

As for storing fluid, only the fluid tanks inside their GUI should be used. You can drain or fill the dolia with liquids, just as what can be done to stew pots. Spice can also be added when taking out soups.

There are 3 input slots for resting recipes: just put all materials inside and leave them alone for a relative long period, and they will convert to something different. Please refer to the Resting pages for details.
